documentation.title: Doc Comment Line Length
documentation.standard: Block comments should not be longer than a set length (default 80 characters), and must not exceed an absolute length (default 100 characters).
Block comment line length should not exceed 80 characters.

code.title: Valid: Comment line is shorter than 80 characters.
Invalid: Comment line is longer than 80 characters.

documentation.standard: Block comment line length must not exceed 100 characters.

code.title: Valid: Comment line is longer than 80 characters, but shorter than 100.
Invalid: Comment line is longer than 100 characters.
